<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// top-level inline frame. e.g. For frame stack &quot;main:1 @ foo:2 @ bar:3&quot;, the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DIL = DIL-&gt;getInlinedAt();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DIL-&gt;getInlinedAt());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InsertMatching = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LineLocation &amp;From, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LineLocation &amp;To) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip the unchanged location mapping to save memory.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use function&#39;s beginning location as the initial anchor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int32&#95;t LocationDelta = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;LineLocation&gt;</a> LastMatchedNonAnchors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a> : IRAnchors) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Loc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsMatchedAnchor = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match the anchor location in lexical order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = MatchedAnchors.find(Loc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R != MatchedAnchors.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Candidate = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      InsertMatching(Loc, Candidate);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Callsite with callee:&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>.second.stringRef()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; is matched from &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Loc &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; to &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Candidate</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LocationDelta = Candidate.LineOffset - Loc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sampleprof/linelocation/#ac38b029469edc31486c5ce8adf89e5f3">LineOffset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match backwards for non-anchor locations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The locations in LastMatchedNonAnchors have been matched forwards</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on the previous anchor, spilt it evenly and overwrite the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// second half based on the current anchor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = (LastMatchedNonAnchors.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() + 1) / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; LastMatchedNonAnchors.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a> = LastMatchedNonAnchors&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">        uint32&#95;t CandidateLineOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>.LineOffset + LocationDelta;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">        LineLocation Candidate(CandidateLineOffset, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>.Discriminator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InsertMatching(L, Candidate);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Location is rematched backwards from &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; L</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; to &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Candidate &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IsMatchedAnchor = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastMatchedNonAnchors.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#aac0ea55010b7b1a301e65a0baea057aa">clear</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match forwards for non-anchor locations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsMatchedAnchor) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LineLocation Candidate(CandidateLineOffset, Loc.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sampleprof/linelocation/#ac8129e173d0cdcdd59271bf89f32544c">Discriminator</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Location is matched from &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Loc &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; to &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Filter the non-call locations from IRAnchors and ProfileAnchors and write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them into a list for random access later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SampleProfileMatcher::getFilteredAnchorList(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a119c56314c891b1049f631457144812f">AnchorMap</a> &amp;IRAnchors, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a119c56314c891b1049f631457144812f">AnchorMap</a> &amp;ProfileAnchors,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab922ecb2ac147fd3b2816cd1182932d3">AnchorList</a> &amp;FilteredIRAnchorsList, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab922ecb2ac147fd3b2816cd1182932d3">AnchorList</a> &amp;FilteredProfileAnchorList) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : IRAnchors) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.second.stringRef().empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FilteredIRAnchorsList.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : ProfileAnchors)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    FilteredProfileAnchorList.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Call target name anchor based profile fuzzy matching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Input:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For IR locations, the anchor is the callee name of direct callsite; For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profile locations, it&#39;s the call target name for BodySamples or inlinee&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profile name for CallsiteSamples.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Matching heuristic:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First match all the anchors using the diff algorithm, then split the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-anchor locations between the two anchors evenly, first half are matched</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on the start anchor, second half are matched based on the end anchor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, given:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IR locations:      &#91;1, 2(foo), 3, 5, 6(bar), 7&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Profile locations: &#91;1, 2, 3(foo), 4, 7, 8(bar), 9&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The matching gives:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#91;1,    2(foo), 3,  5,  6(bar), 7&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    |     |       |   |     |     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#91;1, 2, 3(foo), 4,  7,  8(bar), 9&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The output mapping: &#91;2-&gt;3, 3-&gt;4, 5-&gt;7, 6-&gt;8, 7-&gt;9&#93;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SampleProfileMatcher::runStaleProfileMatching(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a119c56314c891b1049f631457144812f">AnchorMap</a> &amp;IRAnchors,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a119c56314c891b1049f631457144812f">AnchorMap</a> &amp;ProfileAnchors, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#ac5c498b2a2603e7b437b91b6dcd3a9f9">LocToLocMap</a> &amp;IRToProfileLocationMap,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RunCFGMatching, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RunCGMatching) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RunCFGMatching &amp;&amp; !RunCGMatching)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Run stale profile matching for &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(IRToProfileLocationMap.empty() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Run stale profile matching only once per function&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab922ecb2ac147fd3b2816cd1182932d3">AnchorList</a> FilteredProfileAnchorList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab922ecb2ac147fd3b2816cd1182932d3">AnchorList</a> FilteredIRAnchorsList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  getFilteredAnchorList(IRAnchors, ProfileAnchors, FilteredIRAnchorsList,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        FilteredProfileAnchorList);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FilteredIRAnchorsList.empty() || FilteredProfileAnchorList.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FilteredIRAnchorsList.size() &gt; <a href="#a950bf9bfe7cbc486a83489f145dbd176">SalvageStaleProfileMaxCallsites</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FilteredProfileAnchorList.size() &gt; <a href="#a950bf9bfe7cbc486a83489f145dbd176">SalvageStaleProfileMaxCallsites</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Skip stale profile matching for &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; because the number of callsites in the IR is &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; FilteredIRAnchorsList.size()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; and in the profile is &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &lt;&lt; FilteredProfileAnchorList.size() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match the callsite anchors by finding the longest common subsequence</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between IR and profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Define a match between two anchors as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) The function names of anchors are the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) The similarity between the anchor functions is above a threshold if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RunCGMatching is set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For 2), we only consider the anchor functions from IR and profile don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// appear on either side to reduce the matching scope. Note that we need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use IR anchor as base(A side) to align with the order of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IRToProfileLocationMap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sampleprof/#ac5c498b2a2603e7b437b91b6dcd3a9f9">LocToLocMap</a> MatchedAnchors =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">      longestCommonSequence(FilteredIRAnchorsList, FilteredProfileAnchorList,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            RunCGMatching </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; Match unused functions &#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CFG level matching:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the callsite matchings to infer matching for the basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block(non-callsite) locations and write the result to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IRToProfileLocationMap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RunCFGMatching)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    matchNonCallsiteLocs(MatchedAnchors, IRAnchors, IRToProfileLocationMap);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SampleProfileMatcher::runOnFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to use flattened function samples for matching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unlike IR, which includes all callsites from the source code, the callsites</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in profile only show up when they are hit by samples, i,e. the profile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// callsites in one context may differ from those in another context. To get</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the maximum number of callsites, we merge the function profiles from all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contexts, aka, the flattened profile to find profile anchors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;FSForMatching = getFlattenedSamplesFor(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/sampleprofile-cpp/#a176dcdd54b914f2847535fc7c8f1f77b">SalvageUnusedProfile</a> &amp;&amp; !FSForMatching) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Apply the matching in place to find the new function&#39;s matched profile.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = FuncToProfileNameMap.find(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R != FuncToProfileNameMap.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FSForMatching = getFlattenedSamplesFor(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to find the salvaged top-level profiles that are explicitly loaded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for the matching, see &quot;functionMatchesProfileHelper&quot; for the details.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FSForMatching &amp;&amp; <a href="#a59c468b86d2e245729b4a78711981452">LoadFuncProfileforCGMatching</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FSForMatching = Reader.getSamplesFor(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;second.stringRef());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FSForMatching)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Anchors for IR. It&#39;s a map from IR location to callee name, callee name is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// empty for non-call instruction and use a dummy name(UnknownIndirectCallee)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for unknown indrect callee name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a119c56314c891b1049f631457144812f">AnchorMap</a> IRAnchors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  findIRAnchors(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, IRAnchors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Anchors for profile. It&#39;s a map from callsite location to a set of callee</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a119c56314c891b1049f631457144812f">AnchorMap</a> ProfileAnchors;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  findProfileAnchors(&#42;FSForMatching, ProfileAnchors);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the callsite match states for profile staleness report.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/sampleprofile-cpp/#accaf075320be45eaba2a9cbf611368a9">ReportProfileStaleness</a> || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/sampleprofile-cpp/#a997d20da5b25193880115dc8a0b5e4ee">PersistProfileStaleness</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">    recordCallsiteMatchStates(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, IRAnchors, ProfileAnchors, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SampleProfileMatcher::countMismatchedFuncSamples(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sampleprof/functionsamples">FunctionSamples</a> &amp;FS,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsTopLevel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;FuncDesc = ProbeManager-&gt;getDesc(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86as/#a58acad10b11edf7fe9b4465d6e02e9bda5b3a782ccae295a254e2794ad30ad07f">FS</a>.getGUID());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip the function that is external or renamed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FuncDesc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ProbeManager-&gt;profileIsHashMismatched(&#42;FuncDesc, FS)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IsTopLevel)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NumStaleProfileFunc++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given currently all probe ids are after block probe ids, once the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checksum is mismatched, it&#39;s likely all the callites are mismatched and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dropped. We conservatively count all the samples as mismatched and stop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// counting the inlinees&#39; profiles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MismatchedFunctionSamples += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86as/#a58acad10b11edf7fe9b4465d6e02e9bda5b3a782ccae295a254e2794ad30ad07f">FS</a>.getTotalSamples();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Even the current-level function checksum is matched, it&#39;s possible that the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nested inlinees&#39; checksums are mismatched that affect the inlinee&#39;s sample</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loading, we need to go deeper to check the inlinees&#39; function samples.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similarly, count all the samples as mismatched if the inlinee&#39;s checksum is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mismatched using this recursive function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86as/#a58acad10b11edf7fe9b4465d6e02e9bda5b3a782ccae295a254e2794ad30ad07f">FS</a>.getCallsiteSamples())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;CS : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">      countMismatchedFuncSamples(CS.second, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> : M) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The value is in the range &#91;0, 1&#93;. The bigger the value is, the more similar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// two sequences are.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Similarity = 0.0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// With extbinary profile format, initial profile loading only reads profile</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// based on current function names in the module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, if a function is renamed, sample loader skips to load its original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profile(which has a different name), we will miss this case. To address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this, we load the top-level profile candidate explicitly for the matching.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The check for similarity or checksum may not be reliable if the function is</span></CodeLine>
